                                          double myCourseRads,
                                          double mySpeedKts,
                                          double observedFreq)
        calculate the doppler component of the observed frequency
        Parameters:
        theBearingRads - bearing to the target
        myCourseRads - ownship course
        mySpeedKts - ownship speed
        observedFreq - observed frequency (hz)
        Returns:
        ownship component of doppler

      • calcPredictedFreqSI

        public static double calcPredictedFreqSI(double SpeedOfSound,
                                         double osHeadingRads,
                                         double tgtHeadingRads,
                                         double osSpeed,
                                         double tgtSpeed,
                                         double bearing,
                                         double fNought)
        perform doppler shift calculation Note: we receive dLat, dLong to support different range calculations. The Excel spreadsheet (DopplerEffect.xls) that is used to verify the algorithm uses flat-earth calcs. In normal use we wish to use round-earth calcs
        Parameters:
        SpeedOfSound - m/s
        osHeadingRads - rads
        tgtHeadingRads - rads
        osSpeed - m/s
        tgtSpeed - m/s
        bearing - radians
        Returns:
